discussion.author: gares
discussion.comment:
Looks OK.  Half of the calls to Unsafe are for pp purposes, a big chunk if just to call constr constructors, maybe there is a corresponding econstr one.

The `refine_with` and `unfold` usage of Unsafe have to be checked.
